trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDisplayModeCollection class is designed to contain a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> objects.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartDisplayModeCollection foi concebida para conter uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to manage collections of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> objects.
trans-unit.target: É utilizada principalmente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo gerir coleções de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A display mode is a special view of a Web page that appears when it is assigned as the current display mode on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Um modo de apresentação é uma vista de uma página Web que é apresentada quando é atribuído como o modo de visualização atual em especial o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Display modes are used in the Web Parts control set to create page views in which users can carry out special tasks, such as editing controls, or rearranging the layout of a page.
trans-unit.target: Modos de apresentação são utilizados no controlo de peças Web definido para criar vistas de página na qual os utilizadores podem realizar tarefas especiais, como editar controlos ou reorganização de esquema de uma página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control defines several display modes, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo define vários modos de apresentação, incluindo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The collection of display modes is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de modos de apresentação é referenciada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: On any particular Web page that uses Web Parts controls, only certain display modes are available.
trans-unit.target: Em qualquer página Web específica que utiliza os controlos de peças Web, estão disponíveis apenas determinados modos de apresentação.

trans-unit.source: The default browse mode and the design mode are nearly always available, but the other display modes are available only if their corresponding zone types are present on the page.
trans-unit.target: O modo de procura predefinido e o modo de estrutura são quase sempre disponíveis, mas os modos de visualização estão disponíveis apenas se os tipos de zona correspondentes estão presentes na página.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control keeps track of the available display modes on a page with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo mantém um registo dos modos de apresentação disponível numa página com o respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This property references a WebPartDisplayModeCollection object that contains all the supported display modes.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade referencia um objeto de WebPartDisplayModeCollection que contém todos os modos de apresentação suportados.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDisplayModeCollection class does not have an exposed constructor, so you cannot create your own new instance of it.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartDisplayModeCollection não tem um construtor exposto, pelo que não é possível criar a seus próprios nova instância do mesmo.

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object and want it to be part of the collection of supported display modes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, you must inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A> method, call the base method to create the collection, and then add any custom display modes to the collection by using its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se criar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>de objeto e pretende que seja a parte da coleção de modos de apresentação suportados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo, tem de herdar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe, substitua o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A>método, chamar o método base para criar a coleção e, em seguida, adicionar os modos de visualização personalizado para a coleção, utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDisplayModeCollection class has two public properties.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartDisplayModeCollection tem duas propriedades públicas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property is a read-only property that indicates whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>propriedade é uma propriedade só de leitura que indica se a coleção é só de leitura.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The overloaded <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Item%2A> property provides access to the members of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O sobrecarregado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Item%2A>propriedade fornece acesso aos membros da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDisplayModeCollection class also has several methods.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebPartDisplayModeCollection também tem vários métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A> method, already mentioned, enables you to add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A>método, já foi mencionado, permite-lhe adicionar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>objetos na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Contains%2A> method determines whether a particular display mode exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Contains%2A>método determina se um modo de apresentação específico existe na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method copies the collection to an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método copia a coleção para uma matriz de objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns the index of a particular display mode within the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.IndexOf%2A>método devolve o índice de um modo de apresentação específico dentro da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Insert%2A> method enables you to insert a display mode object at a particular index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Insert%2A>método permite-lhe introduzir um objeto de modo de apresentação num índice específico na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Add method to add new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> objects to an existing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o método Add para adicionar novos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>objetos a um existente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: An example of a scenario in which you would do this is when you create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class, and you want to add it to the collection of supported display modes on a page.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de um cenário em que isto seria feito é quando cria um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>classe e pretende adicionar à coleção de modos de apresentação suportados numa página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: To do that, you must inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class and override its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A> method, first calling the base method, and then using the Add method to add the custom display mode to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Para tal, tem de herdar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>classe e substituir a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A>método, primeiro ao chamar o método base e, em seguida, utilizando o método de adicionar para adicionar o modo de visualização personalizado à coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateDisplayModes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> para adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that indicates where the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> was inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que indica onde o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> foi inserido na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> object exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se um determinado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> objeto existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object and determine whether it is in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O método contém permite-lhe verificar um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>de objeto e determinar se faz parte de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> being checked for its existence in a collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> a ser verificada a existência de uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether value exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se value existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia a coleção para uma matriz de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to create a custom array to programmatically manipulate a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> objects.
trans-unit.target: O método CopyTo é útil quando pretender criar uma matriz personalizada para manipular programaticamente um conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> objetos que contém a coleção copiada.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica o ponto de partida da matriz no qual pretende colocar o conteúdo da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a posição de um membro da coleção específica.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> objects, and you need to know the ordinal position (the index) of one object relative to the others.
trans-unit.target: O método IndexOf é útil se tiver vários <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>objetos e precisa de saber a posição ordinal (o índice) de um objeto relativos a outras pessoas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> que é um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica a posição de um determinado objeto da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> object into the collection at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: Insere um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> objeto à coleção na posição índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se `index` é igual ao número de itens da coleção de, em seguida, `value` é acrescentado ao fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the ordinal position in the collection at which a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica a posição ordinal na coleção em que um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> devem ser inseridos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> ao inserir na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a coleção é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: The IsReadOnly property value is changed internally by the Web Parts control set as it changes the contents of the collection at different points.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade IsReadOnly é alterado internamente pelo controlo de peças Web definido como também altera o conteúdo da coleção em pontos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has added all supported display modes to its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> collection, it internally sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> object to read-only to prevent it from being changed.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, após o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controlo adicionado suportadas apresentam modos para sua <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>coleção, internamente define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection>objeto para só de leitura para os impedir de que está a ser alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no mechanism to change this property value from your code, although you can read its value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não é não existe nenhum mecanismo para alterar este valor da propriedade a partir do código, embora pode ler o valor.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booleano que indica se a coleção é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific member of the collection according to its index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um membro da coleção de acordo com o respetivo índice específico.

trans-unit.source: The Item property enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> collection by using an index number that represents its ordinal position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do Item permite-lhe aceder a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>objeto dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection>coleção utilizando um número de índice que representa a ordinal posição na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que indica o índice de um membro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"> </xref> no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um membro específico da coleção de acordo com um identificador exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: The Item property enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> collection by using a string identifier for a particular display mode.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do Item permite-lhe aceder a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>objeto dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection>coleção utilizando um identificador de cadeia para o modo de apresentação específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of a particular display mode in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o nome de um modo de apresentação específico na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The first whose mode name matches the value of the modeName parameter.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro cujo nome de modo corresponde ao valor da modeName parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
